attributes.action: Remove all members of parliament from their positions and start again.
attributes.background: If we can just remove all parliament members and start a fresh, let the people decide who should have a say on Brexit.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions that call for someone to be given or lose their job.

If you would like another general election you could sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235480
